p:
Many studies have reported the in vitro antifungal effect of oregano essential oil, obtaining different degrees of inhibition. 7, 41, 42, 43 The inhibitory effectiveness of oregano oil is strictly related to factors such as taxonomy of the species, agronomic practice, climate, extraction method of essential oil, concentration of the active compounds, fungal genus, and the concentration of inoculated spores. 44, 45 In addition, the resistance of fungi to the inhibitory effect of oregano oil is dependent on its chemical composition.
46
